original_text: So it is with you. Unless you speak intelligible words with your tongue, how will anyone know what you are saying? You will just be speaking into the air.
korean_text: 이와 같이 너희도 혀로써 알아 듣기 쉬운 말을 하지 아니하면 그 말하는 것을 어찌 알리요 이는 허공에다 말하는 것이라

sentences.original_text: Unless you speak intelligible words with your tongue
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 혀로 명확한 말을 하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: how will anyone know what you are saying
You will just be speaking into the air
